amendment.description: An amendment numbered 61 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to restore funding for the Commodity Futures Trading Corporation to FY19 levels, and direct the remainder to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Commodity Futures Trading Corporation by $77,000,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 325 (Roll no. 416).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 325 (Roll no. 416).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
